training_quality_justification: Exceptional learning value for security patterns (Secrets Manager vs hardcoded passwords), multi-AZ architecture, dynamic resource naming, and comprehensive WordPress deployment with 8+ AWS services. MODEL_FAILURES.md documents critical security vulnerabilities and architectural improvements. Score 9/10 due to standard use case (WordPress is well-documented) but excellent execution of security and HA best practices.
author: akshat-jain355
